endpoint.description: X-Ray service endpoint to which the collector sends segment documents.

external_id.description: External ID to verify third party role assumption

index_all_attributes.description: Set to true to convert all OpenTelemetry attributes to X-Ray annotation (indexed) ignoring the IndexedAttributes option. Default value: false

indexed_attributes.description: By default, OpenTelemetry attributes are converted to X-Ray metadata, which are not indexed. Specify a list of attribute names to be converted to X-Ray annotations instead, which will be indexed. See annotation vs. metadata: https://docs.aws.amazon.com/xray/latest/devguide/xray-concepts.html#xray-concepts-annotations

local_mode.description: Local mode to skip EC2 instance metadata check.

max_retries.description: Maximum number of retries before abandoning an attempt to post data.

no_verify_ssl.description: Enable or disable TLS certificate verification.

num_workers.description: Maximum number of concurrent calls to AWS X-Ray to upload documents.

proxy_address.description: Upload segments to AWS X-Ray through a proxy.

region.description: Send segments to AWS X-Ray service in a specific region.

request_timeout_seconds.description: Number of seconds before timing out a request.

resource_arn.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the AWS resource running the collector.

role_arn.description: IAM role to upload segments to a different account.

telemetry.description: TelemetryConfig contains the options for telemetry collection.

contributors.description: Contributors can be used to explicitly define which X-Ray components are contributing to the telemetry. If omitted, only X-Ray components with the same component.ID as the setup component will have access.

enabled.description: Enabled determines whether any telemetry should be recorded.

hostname.description: Hostname can be used to explicitly define the hostname associated with the telemetry.

include_metadata.description: IncludeMetadata determines whether metadata (instance ID, hostname, resourceARN) should be included in the telemetry.

instance_id.description: InstanceID can be used to explicitly define the instance ID associated with the telemetry.

resource_arn.description: ResourceARN can be used to explicitly define the resource ARN associated with the telemetry.
